questions.question: This arc is notable for its depiction of the Straw Hat Pirates' battle against the Donquixote Family. What is...?
This arc focuses on the backstory of Sanji and his connections to the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This arc features a deadly game run by a Warlord of the Sea on an island in the New World. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability grants the power to transform into a hybrid and full giraffe form. What is...?
questions.answer: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe

questions.question: This technique, utilized by Sanji, sets his leg on fire, enhancing the power of his kicks. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and control earthquakes. What is...?
This character, known for their nickname 'Dead Bones', is a former Warlord of the Sea and master of swordsmanship. Who is...?
This captain of the Red Hair Pirates is known for his laid-back demeanor and being one of the Four Emperors. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for their former bounty of 340 million berries and their power of the Mera Mera no Mi. Who is...?
